A ) The 1$ category
We decided to do 1$/month VPS for first time this year and to do that we had to do some compromises to make the offer in the 1$ / month range

here what we did 
1) we had to make the billing 1 year instead of monthly as usual in order to commit the plan for 1 year and save on processing fees 

2) The support for those plans will be a bit different , we have a support forum and users who need support initially ask there , if no answers given we will answer in the forum 
So at the end we will do full support but we just made L1 through the forum and no chat support for these

3) we are forced to remove the included IPv4 and make it extra . as we couldnt fit the plan with usable resources while having the IPv4 included (you can add it for extra when ordering)
